experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of Arabidopsis mutant for srk2cf after treatment with ABA

description.text: Microarray experiments were performed using Arabidopsis wild type plants (Col-0) and srk2cf double knockout mutants to investigate functions of two osmotic stress-activated protein kinases, SRK2C and SRK2F. Transcription profiles of wild type and mutants were compared under abscisic acid (ABA) treatment for 0, 1 and 4 h.

bibliography.authors: Mizoguchi, Masahide; Umezawa, Taishi; Nakashima, Kazuo; Kidokoro, Satoshi; Takasaki, Hironori; Fujita, Yasunari; Yamaguchi-Shinozaki, Kazuko; Shinozaki, Kazuo
bibliography.title: Two Closely Related Subclass II SnRK2 Protein Kinases Cooperatively Regulate Drought-Inducible Gene Expression
